patthana21.46:4.1: Naāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.46:5.1: Nanoāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.46:5.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.46:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.46:7.1: Noāsavaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.46:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
